review: I really enjoyed the course. The content was well-structured and the explanations were clear. I would have given it a 5-star rating if there were more hands-on coding exercises.
This course exceeded my expectations! The instructor's deep dive into advanced concepts was fantastic. The real-world examples helped solidify my understanding.
The project showcase was a great way to apply what we learned. The only downside was that some projects were more complex than others, making it a bit uneven.
The UI Design course had potential, but it lacked in-depth coverage of responsive design techniques. I'd love to see more examples focused on mobile devices.
A comprehensive guide to state management in React. The Redux section was a highlight for me. I feel much more confident in managing complex application states now.
